en-US.summary: Tells you information about a countries standing during the COVID-19 pandemic.
en-US.name: Covid Tracker
en-US.description: Have you ever wondered how well a country is doing in the midst of the pandemic? You can now find out by asking Alexa! Some information covered in this skill includes discovering the number of confirmed cases, the number of deaths, and the number of recovered cases for a country of your choice! The data used in this skill is updated daily and is fetched from https://pomber.github.io/covid19/timeseries.json. Stay safe out there and don't forget to social distance!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Test with different countries and see if it responds with an answer.
